page.title: 14CHILDRENS' PASTIMES age 7-11
page.content: A survey of the{activities}of{7 to {11 year olds}produced the following results. Of 137 children surveyed,the most popular activity was{playing either with{friends}(66.5%),or with {toys}(15%).{Sport}is the next most popular pastime. This category includes{football,swimming,fishing, {cricket,running,darts,acrobatics,pool, {table tennis,rounders,netball,snooker, {horse riding,}and{roller skating.}52% of the children took part in these. The table below shows the{%}taking part in each activity. Every child could take part in any activity. {VISITING (relatives/friends) 16% PLAYING 81.5% SPORT 52% {WATCHING TV 40% BIKE RIDING 21% SHOPPING 19% {32%}do other activities -{art,sewing, {caravanning,singing,bird watching etc.
